typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		WorkLoc as string,
		Designation as string,
		Project as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> adfsample
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Age as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dsfsampleage
adfsample, dsfsampleage join(adfsample@Name == dsfsampleage@Name,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
InnerJoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['dsfilejoin'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		WorkLoc,
		Designation,
		Project,
		Name = dsfsampleage@Name,
		Age
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
